com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Class CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass,ViewClass,HandlerClass>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasisBitmapDownloader

    public abstract class CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for downloading the bitmaps in dedicated threads and to bind them to Android Views.
    Since:
    2009.02.19
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

      • cache

        protected final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CoreBitmapDownloader.UsedBitmap> cache
        Holds the instance bitmap memory cache. The Map String entry if the URL of a cached bitmap.

        A HashMap is used instead of a Hashtable, because we want to allow null values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoreBitmapDownloader

        protected CoreBitmapDownloader(int instanceIndex,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    long highLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes,
                    long lowLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes,
                    boolean useReferences,
                    boolean recycleMap)
        Parameters:
        instanceIndex - the index of the current instance. When creating multiple instances, it is important to provide a unique index, so that the CoreBitmapDownloader.AnalyticsListener knows what instance is at stake
        name - the name of the instance, used for the logs and the analytics
        highLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes - the number of maximum bytes space that this instance will allow cached bitmaps to take in memory
        lowLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes - when the instance has been cleaned up, how much space the cached bitmap will take at most
        useReferences -
        recycleMap -

      • get

        public abstract void get(ViewClass view,
       java.lang.String bitmapUid,
       java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
       HandlerClass handler,
       BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass,ViewClass> instructions)
        This method will retrieve the bitmap corresponding to the provided identifier along with the provided instructions, and bind it to the provided View. This instruction is considered as a download and binding job.

        Can be invoked from any thread, not only the GUI's! The method is non-blocking, which means that the job is done in an asynchronous way.

        Here are some noteworthy contracts that the component enforces:
        • The component ensures that any OutOfMemoryError exception thrown during the commands of the job are caught properly, so that the caller does not have to deal with potential memory saturation problems.
        • The component will only download once the bitmap corresponding to a given URL, even if several commands are run successively for the same URL, in order to save battery and network band usage.
        Parameters:
        view - the view that will be bound with the retrieved Bitmap. May be null, which enables to simply download a bitmap and put it into the cache
        bitmapUid - the identifier of the bitmap to retrieve. Most of the time, this is the URL of the bitmap on Internet, but it can serve as a basis to compute the actual URL
        imageSpecs - a free object that will be passed along during the bitmap retrieval workflow
        handler - will be used for performing GUI-thread operations
        instructions - the instructions that will be invoked during the retrieval workflow
        See Also:
        #get(boolean, boolean, Viewable, String, Object, Handlerable, com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions)

      • get

        public abstract void get(boolean isPreBlocking,
       boolean isDownloadBlocking,
       ViewClass view,
       java.lang.String bitmapUid,
       java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
       HandlerClass handler,
       BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass,ViewClass> instructions)
        Provides the same feature as #computeAndGetUrl(View, String, Object, HandlerClass, BasisBitmapDownloader.Instructions), except that it may be called from the GUI thread and blocking.

        Invoking that method with the two isPreBlocking and isDownloadBlocking parameters set to true will execute the command from the calling thread, which involves that the caller should be the UI thread, or that the provided view parameter is null. This type of invocation is especially useful when the download and bind command must be run in a synchronous way.

        Parameters:
        isPreBlocking - indicates whether the generated command first step will be executed directly from the calling thread. If true, the call must be done from the GUI thread, or the provided view must be null!
        isDownloadBlocking - indicates whether the generated command second step will be executed directly from the calling thread. If the previous isPreBlocking argument is set to false, this parameter is ignored. If true, the call must be done from the GUI thread, or the provided view must be null!
        See Also:
        #get(Viewable, String, Object, Handlerable, com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions)

      • clear

        public abstract void clear()
        Empties the cache, so that no more bitmap is available in memory.

        All operations in progress should be canceled.

      • getUsedBitmapFromCache

        protected final CoreBitmapDownloader.UsedBitmap getUsedBitmapFromCache(java.lang.String url)

      • putInCache

        protected final CoreBitmapDownloader.UsedBitmap putInCache(java.lang.String url,
                                         BitmapClass bitmap)

      • cleanUpCache

        protected final void cleanUpCache()
        Is responsible for cleaning up the cache, until the low-level memory water mark is reached.

        If o clean-up is already in progress, the method returns immediately without processing anything.

        See Also:
        cleanUpCacheInstance()

      • cleanUpCacheInstance

        protected void cleanUpCacheInstance()
        This method is responsible for actually cleaning up the memory cache, by enforcing the highLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes and lowLevelMemoryWaterMarkInBytes limits. This method is aimed at being overridden, so as to set up another clean up policy.

        It is responsible for cleaning up the cache attribute and update the memoryConsumptionInBytes attribute accordingly.

        See Also:
        cleanUpCache()

      • dump

        protected void dump()
        Dumps the analytics about the current state of the instance.

      • notifyAnalyticsListener

        public final void notifyAnalyticsListener()
        Forces the BitmapDownloader to send its analytics. If the ANALYTICS_LISTENER is not null, it will be notified with the latest analytics.

      • computeAnalyticsData

        protected CoreBitmapDownloader.CoreAnalyticsData computeAnalyticsData()
        Returns:
        the analytics currently available
